title: These Special Regulations shall be applicable to buildings vulnerable to terrorist attack / man- made disasters within the area under the jurisdiction of Municipal Corporations / Special Planning Authorities
clause_text: These Special Regulations shall be applicable to buildings vulnerable to terrorist attack / man- made disasters within the area under the jurisdiction of Municipal Corporations / Special Planning Authorities.
